supportedenumerations.aborted: An internal device, communication or security error

supportedenumerations.airClean: unit is in air clean mode or state

supportedenumerations.airfilterconsumable: identifies the main air filter consumable ("oic.r.consumable") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.airflow: Identifies the main airflow ("oic.r.airflow") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.airpurifierswitch: identifies that the switch ("oic.r.switch.binary") can turn on/off the air purifying function of the Device

supportedenumerations.airqualityairpollution: identifies the air quality ("oic.r.airquality") Resource measuring (total) air pollution

supportedenumerations.airqualityodor: identifies the air quality ("oic.r.airquality") Resource measuring odor

supportedenumerations.airqualitypm1: identifies the air quality ("oic.r.airquality") Resource measuring pm1

supportedenumerations.airqualitypm10: identifies the air quality ("oic.r.airquality") Resource measuring pm10

supportedenumerations.airqualitypm2.5: identifies the air quality ("oic.r.airquality") Resource measuring pm2.5

supportedenumerations.ambient: unit is in ambient mode or state

supportedenumerations.alarmtimeperiod: identifies the duration time for an alarm ("oic.r.time.period")

supportedenumerations.armedMaximum: unit is armed at maximum level

supportedenumerations.armedNightStay: unit is armed in night stay

supportedenumerations.armedStay: unit is armed in stay mode

supportedenumerations.aroma: unit is armed in aroma mode

supportedenumerations.artificialintelligence: unit is in artificial intelligence mode

supportedenumerations.auto: unit is in auto mode or state

supportedenumerations.awning: identifies that the instance of "oic.r.windowcovering" represents an awning

supportedenumerations.babyCare: unit is in baby care mode or state

supportedenumerations.baking: unit is in baking mode or state

supportedenumerations.battery: identifies the main battery ("oic.r.battery") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.boiling: unit is in boiling state or mode

supportedenumerations.brewing: unit is in brewing state or mode

supportedenumerations.cancelled: the job was cancelled either by the remote client or by the user

supportedenumerations.circulating: unit is in circulating model or state

supportedenumerations.cleaning: unit is in cleaning mode or state

supportedenumerations.contactsensor: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of contact sensor

supportedenumerations.convenientroomdoor: identifies the convenient room door ("oic.r.door") of the refrigerator ("oic.d.refrigerator")

supportedenumerations.cool: unit is in cooling mode or state

supportedenumerations.coolingtargettemperature: identifies the target cooling temperature ("oic.r.temperature") Resource of the air conditioner ("oic.d.airconditioner")

supportedenumerations.coolerdoor: identifies the cooler door ("oic.r.door") of the Device

supportedenumerations.coolermeasuredtemperature: identifies the measured cooler temperature ("oic.r.temperature") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.coolertargettemperature: identifies the target cooler temperature ("oic.r.temperature") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.cosensor: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of carbon monoxide sensor

supportedenumerations.currenttemperature: identifies the current measured temperature ("oic.r.temperature") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.delicate: unit is in delicate mode or state

supportedenumerations.deodorization: identifies the main deodorization ("oic.r.deodorization") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.diagnosis: unit is in diagnosis mode or state; when an error occurs, a Device is in diagnosis mode (state) for identifying causes and finding solutions

supportedenumerations.disabled: unit's current operational mode is disabled

supportedenumerations.dishwasherdoor: identifies the main door ("oic.r.door") Resource of the Dish Washer ("oic.d.dishwasher")

supportedenumerations.drapery: identifies that the instance of "oic.r.windowcovering" represents drapery

supportedenumerations.ecomode: identifies the main (overall) ecomode ("oic.r.ecomode") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.edge: unit is edge mode or state

supportedenumerations.enabled: unit's current operational mode is enabled

supportedenumerations.extended: unit is in extended mode or state

supportedenumerations.fan: unit is in fan mode or state

supportedenumerations.fast: unit is in fast mode or state

supportedenumerations.filterMaterial: filter material that is used by a Device

supportedenumerations.firesensor: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of fire sensor

supportedenumerations.focused: unit is in focused mode or state

supportedenumerations.freezerdoor: identifies the freezer room door ("oic.r.door") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.freezermeasuredtemperature: identifies the measured freezer temperature ("oic.r.temperature") of the Device

supportedenumerations.freezertargettemperature: identifies the target freezer temperature ("oic.r.temperature") of the Device

supportedenumerations.glassbreaksensor: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of glass break sensor

supportedenumerations.grinding: unit is in grinding state or mode

supportedenumerations.heating: unit is in heating mode or state

supportedenumerations.heatingtargettemperature: identifies the target heating temperature ("oic.r.temperature") of the Device

supportedenumerations.heavy: unit is in heavy mode or state

supportedenumerations.homing: unit is in homing state, Device produces a special signal so that it can be found using electronic equipment

supportedenumerations.hot: unit is in hot mode or state

supportedenumerations.humidify: unit is in humidify mode or state

supportedenumerations.humidity: identifies the main humidity ("oic.r.humidity") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.ice: unit is in ice mode or state

supportedenumerations.idle: new jobs can start processing without waiting

supportedenumerations.initializing: unit is in initializing state, a Device resets its values set by a Client to initial values set by manufacturer

supportedenumerations.ink: generic ink cartridge for a Device

supportedenumerations.inkBlack: black ink cartridge for a Device

supportedenumerations.inkCyan: cyan ink cartridge for a Device

supportedenumerations.inkMagenta: magenta ink cartridge for a Device

supportedenumerations.inkTricolour: tricolour ink cartridge for a Device

supportedenumerations.inkYellow: yellow ink cartridge for a Device

supportedenumerations.invalid: unit is in an invalid mode, state, or setting

supportedenumerations.keepwarm: unit is in keep warm state or mode

supportedenumerations.keyfob: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of key fob

supportedenumerations.keypad: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of keypad

supportedenumerations.localtime: identifies the clock ("oic.r.clock") time representing the local time zone

supportedenumerations.macro: unit is in macro mode or state, Client manually inputs a rule or pattern of operation

supportedenumerations.mapping: unit is in mapping mode or state

supportedenumerations.monitoring: unit is in monitoring mode or state; such as security functions detecting unusual movements in an empty place for a camera-mounted Device

supportedenumerations.monitoringInitializing: unit is in initializing state in monitoring mode; a Device resets its values of monitoring mode to initial values set by manufacturer

supportedenumerations.monitoringMoving: unit is in moving state in monitoring mode; following a specific target that client select while the Device is in monitoring mode

supportedenumerations.monitoringPreparation: unit is in preparation state in monitoring mode; a Device is getting ready for its monitoring operation

supportedenumerations.motionsensor: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of motion sensor

supportedenumerations.moving: unit is in moving state; the action of going to a different place

supportedenumerations.none: unit is in an undefined mode or state

supportedenumerations.normal: unit is in a normal operational state

supportedenumerations.notsupported: ability to set a specific operational mode by a Client is not supported

supportedenumerations.onedoorfridgedoor: identifies the single door ("oic.r.door") of the Device

supportedenumerations.operationalstate: identifies the main (overall) operational state ("oic.r.operational.state") of the Device

supportedenumerations.operationalmode: identifies the main (overall) mode ("oic.r.mode") of the Device

supportedenumerations.ped: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of personal emergency device

supportedenumerations.pendingHeld: job is not a candidate for processing for any number of reasons, will return to pending state if reasons are solved

supportedenumerations.permapress: unit is in permanent press mode or state

supportedenumerations.powerswitch: identifies the Resource that is the main power switch ("oic.r.switch.binary"), e.g. on/off of the Device

supportedenumerations.preHeat: unit is in pre-heat mode or state

supportedenumerations.preparation: unit is in preparation mode or state; a Device is getting ready for its operation

supportedenumerations.preSteam: unit is in pre-steam mode or state

supportedenumerations.projectorscreen: identifies that the instance of "oic.r.windowcovering" represents a projector screen

supportedenumerations.pure: unit is in pure mode or state

supportedenumerations.quick: unit is in quick mode or state

supportedenumerations.refresh: unit is in refresh mode or state

supportedenumerations.refrigeration: identifies the main ("oic.r.refrigeration") Resource of the Device

supportedenumerations.relativeremainingtimeperiod: identifies the Resource as (overall) relative remaining time period ("oic.r.time.period")

supportedenumerations.remainingtimeperiod: identifies the Resource as (overall) absolute remaining time period ("oic.r.time.period")

supportedenumerations.remotecontrol: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of remote control

supportedenumerations.remotecontrolenable: identifies the Resource for remote control enable ("oic.r.switch.binary"), e.g. remote enablement of the Device

supportedenumerations.sectored: unit is in sectored mode or state

supportedenumerations.securityrepeater: identifies an "Intruder Alert Zone" ("oic.r.iaszoneinfo") type of security repeater

supportedenumerations.shutter: identifies that the instance of "oic.r.windowcovering" represents a shutter
